original_text: When the camp is to set out, Aaron and his sons shall go in and take down the veil of the screen and cover the ark of the testimony with it.
korean_text: 진영이 전진할 때에 아론과 그의 아들들이 들어가서 칸 막는 휘장을 걷어 증거궤를 덮고

sentences.original_text: When the camp is to set out
Aaron and his sons shall go in
and take down the veil of the screen
and cover the ark of the testimony with it.
